skillTree.localised_description: There is great pleasure to be derived from the humiliation and suffering of others; this one has felt and revelled in it.
The strength of this warrior's attack never wavers for an instance, such is the opprobrium felt for their hated High Elf cousins.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves

skillTree.localised_description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.
A gore-red rune blazes upon Urial’s brow, marking him as one of Khaine’s chosen.
“So, you want to know how I got this lustrous hair?”
His gore-red rune blazes upon the Death Hag's brow, marking her as one of the Lord of Murder's chosen.
The air burns with bilious black smoke from bygone sacrifices, for the Temple of Khaine never ceases, for the Lord of Murder is never sated.

effects.description:
Control: +2 for every concurrent war with a neighbouring faction
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Unlike his brutish half-brother, Malus Darkblade, and the rest of his bloodline, Urial is very good at gathering information. Most overlook the threat a humble cripple can present.

effects.description:
Hero action success chance: +15%
	(Heroes in local region)

skillTree.localised_description: His lack of physical strength prevented him from becoming a Khainite Assassin. Urial was, instead, raised as a devoted disciple of the Cult.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8

skillTree.localised_description: Blinded by arrogance and delusions of grandeur, Urial believes he is the Incarnate of Khaine foretold in ancient prophecy.

effects.description:
Sacrifices for Khaine commandment: Post-battle loot +5%
	(all provinces)

Sacrifices for Khaine commandment: Weapon strength +10%
	(all provinces)

Sacrifices for Khaine commandment: Recruit rank +1
	(all provinces)

Sacrifices for Khaine commandment: Slaves Consumption -25
	(all provinces)

skillTree.localised_description: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.
There is nothing but utter belief. There is no reasoning with this one.
"Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"
Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Calling upon the full power of the Lord of Murder, Urial is able to annihilate his foes with a single blow.

attributes.bullet_text: A unit with Executioner will execute units in combat below a 20% hit points threshold.

skillTree.localised_description: Empowered by bloodshed, the devotees of Khaine rush into combat in a brutal frenzy.

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

skillTree.localised_description: This ancient incantation can rend old wounds anew, letting rivers of blood from the victim.
Utilising nearby pools of blood, Urial can form a magical crimson shield to protect himself from harm.
Those blessed by the Bloody-Handed God can continue to fight through eviscerating, mortal blows, leaving their enemy to die baffled.
A true devotee of Khaine becomes an instrument of industrialized bloodshed, every swipe and thrust of their blade choreographed to perfection by the Lord of Murder.
Sacrificing the lives of the weak allows Urial to call forth the souls scorned by the Dark Mother.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero
Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: An incantation only a few can successfully cast without their immediate fatality. Urial is one of those few, able to momentarily manifest a portal to Khaine’s realm and have the souls of those near His grasp snatched away.
Urial siphons the surrounding Winds of Magic to himself, corrupting it for his own spells.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: -10
	(enemy armies in local region)

skillTree.localised_description: The priests of Khaine are brutal killers; the more blood they reap, the more their desire for carnage grows.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

skillTree.localised_description: Using a rare and dangerous spell, Urial opens a blood-red portal, allowing him to disappear and reappear anywhere he pleases.
Few do not outright despise Urial, however, the chosen few who do follow him are granted terrifying boons.
By shouting one of the 17 secret names of Khaine, Urial shatters the enemy’s resolve and strengthens his own.

related_attributes.bullet_text:
When charging into an enemy unit:
	  Charge Bonus duration is doubled.
	 Enemy units take a  Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: Urial's sorcery protects army from the worst of elements and fell sorceries

effects.description:
Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The price for the Cult's help is not cheap, and it always recieves its dues.

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional -3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional -8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: All civilisations require slaves. It is upon their toil that our future depends.

effects.description: Enlist Slaves action: Slaves generated per turn are increased by an additional -5
Enlist Slaves action: Slaves generated per turn are increased by an additional -10
Enlist Slaves action: Slaves generated per turn are increased by an additional -15

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

enabled_if: Unit has exceeded the murderous prowess value

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

items.colour_text: A brazen axe covered with malicious runes. The blood of hundreds becomes a conduit for channeling Khaine’s unholy power.

item_set.name: Armoury of the Temple
item_set.description: A vast collection of magical treasures, only bestowed upon Khaine’s most devoted.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +3 when attacking
	(all units in army)

items.colour_text: Under his robes, Urial’s body is covered in runic tattoos that help compensate for his deformities.

item_set.name: Armoury of the Temple
item_set.description: A vast collection of magical treasures, only bestowed upon Khaine’s most devoted.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +3 when attacking
	(all units in army)

items.colour_text: A sacred stone enchanted within the boiling Blood Cauldron that Urial was once discarded into, this Bloodstone emanates an aura of protection.

item_set.name: Armoury of the Temple
item_set.description: A vast collection of magical treasures, only bestowed upon Khaine’s most devoted.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +3 when attacking
	(all units in army)

items.colour_text: This ancient ring that was once worn by a sorceress of Nagarythe. The passage of time has worn away many of its more majestic features, yet its magical power has been enhanced by Urial’s malice.

effects.description: adds the ability that grants the spell intensity
Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

item_set.name: Armoury of the Temple
item_set.description: A vast collection of magical treasures, only bestowed upon Khaine’s most devoted.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +3 when attacking
	(all units in army)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit is unable to activate abilities or cast spells.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +10

items.colour_text: Using a rare and dangerous spell, Urial opens a blood-red portal, allowing him to disappear and reappear anywhere he pleases.
Few do not outright despise Urial, however, the chosen few who do follow him are granted terrifying boons.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional -20%
Enlist Slaves action: Slaves generated per turn are increased by an additional -15

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deformed from birth, Urial was offered to Khaine by his parents. However, the crippled newborn was spat out by the bubbling Blood Cauldron he was thrown into, a clear sign of Khaine’s favour.

effects.description: Active time for "Murderous prowess" and "Murderous Mastery" abilities +25%
Cost of all spells -1% while in a regiogion with Temple of Khaine building
